column4: does anyone happen to know when the next ubuntu membership meeting for the americas might be? the wiki page says july 15th and I cant find any mention of the next date in the irc logs. -- https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Membership/RegionalBoards/Americas
#ubuntu-meeting or the planet fridge calendar likely would have that info
thanks, i dont see anything on the fridge calendar for the next 3 months though. I guess I will look into applying through another country
sometimes listings are misplaced or dont get through, if you post a question in #ubuntu-meeting someone will likely reply
